DOC:
Subject: Angels win! Date: 6 Apr 93 08:21:18 GMT Article-I.D.: pollux.1psvouINNa2l Distribution: world Lines: 6
The Angels won their home opener against the Brewers today before 33,000+ at Anaheim Stadium, 3-1 on a 3-hitter by Mark Langston. J.T. Snow and Gary Discarcina hit home runs for the Angels.
Daniel
